document.full_text: opponents of yemen's president stepped up a campaign on friday to force him out, but ali abdullah saleh was defiant as he addressed thousands of supporters and urged the opposition to join peace talks.
document.title: yemen's saleh calls for talks as protests escalate
lines_and_colors: opponents of yemen's president stepped up a campaign on friday to force him out, but ali abdullah saleh was defiant as he addressed thousands of supporters and urged the opposition to join peace talks.
